participant_2.background:
I'm curious about the relationship between humans and animals, and how we can better understand each other.
I played video games to pass the time on my last vacation.
I play for my family.
I look at my collection of mermaid books and imagine swimming with them.
I get along with my family well.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well! I just got back from a long day at work.
What do you do for work?
I'm a researcher at a university. I study the relationship between humans and animals.
That sounds really interesting! What's your favorite part of the job?
I love learning new things about animals and how they interact with humans. It's really fascinating!
I can imagine! I've always been curious about the relationship between humans and animals.
What do you think is the most interesting thing about the relationship between humans and animals?
I think it's amazing how we can learn so much about ourselves by studying animals. They're such complex creatures, and we can learn a lot from them about our own behavior.
I agree! I think animals can teach us a lot about the world around us.
I love cats! They're so independent and curious.
Me too! I have two cats of my own.
Me too! They're the best pets.
